message:
This previous response from [Chad] failed to parse!: 'Dave, there was an error because beef_patty1 was not yet on the cutting_board. I will PUT beef_patty1 on the bacon, and then you can PUT bread_slice2 on top of it to complete the sandwich.

EXECUTE
NAME Chad ACTION PUT beef_patty1 bacon
NAME Dave ACTION WAIT'
Object beef_patty1 cannot be PUT down, robot Chad is not in contact with it. Re-format to strictly follow [Action Output Instruction]!

Dave, there was an error because beef_patty1 was not yet on the cutting_board. I will PUT beef_patty1 on the bacon, and then you can PUT bread_slice2 on top of it to complete the sandwich.

EXECUTE
NAME Chad ACTION PUT beef_patty1 bacon
NAME Dave ACTION WAIT
